title: Tucson police: child shot near Campbell and Bilby
content:
TUCSON, AZ (Tucson News Now) -
Tucson police are investigating a shooting involving a 7-year-old on the south side near Campbell Ave. and Bilby Road, according to TPD spokesman Sgt. Pete Dugan.
TPD officials said the 7-year-old was shot inside an apartment on the third floor of the Rancho del Mar Apartments. The child doesn't live in the apartments, but was visiting family.
Detectives were still interviewing family members, according to TPD officials to determine if it was an accidental or intentional shooting.
The child is out of surgery and is listed as stable, according to Sgt. Dugan.
@Tucson_Police investigating 7yr old boy who was shot in the back. Critical condition 6200 S Campbell. One detained. pic.twitter.com/s7rxaisQ9C
— Sergeant Pete Dugan (@SgtDugan) April 28, 2016
TPD Crime Scene crews were on scene.
